title: Libraries
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123630/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : Libraries**

[Robertson Davies Library, Massey College](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123630/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Robertson%20Davies%20Library%2C%20Massey%20College), Toronto  
 [Melbert B. Cary Jr. Graphic Arts Collection](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123630/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Melbert%20B.%20Cary%20Jr.%20Graphic%20Arts%20Collection), Rochester, NY  
 [St. Bride Printing Library](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123630/http:/typophile.com/wiki/St.%20Bride%20Printing%20Library), London

**Digital Libraries on-line**  
 [World Digital Library](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123630/http:/www.wdl.org/)  
 [Biblioteca Nacional Digital](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123630/http:/www.bn.br/bndigital/), Brasil  
 [Biblioteca Nacional Digital](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123630/http:/purl.pt/), Portugal  
 [Biblioteca Digital Hispánica](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123630/http:/www.bne.es/esp/catalogos/coleccionesdigitales.htm), Spain  
 [Biblioteca Virtual de Andalucía](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123630/http:/www.juntadeandalucia.es/cultura/bibliotecavirtualandalucia/), Spain  
 [Biblioteca Valenciana Digital](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123630/http:/bv2.gva.es/es/estaticos/contenido.cmd?pagina=estaticos/inicio), Spain  
 [Biblioteca Virtual de Prensa Historica](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123630/http:/prensahistorica.mcu.es/), Spain  
 [Biblioteca Virtual Miguel de Cervantes](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123630/http:/www.cervantesvirtual.com/), Spain  
 [Fondos Digitalizados de la Universidad de Sevilla](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123630/http:/fondosdigitales.us.es/), Spain  
 [Colección Digital Complutense](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123630/http:/www.ucm.es/BUCM/atencion/5761.php), Spain  
 [Universitat de Barcelona -- Col·leccions digitals](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123630/http:/www.bib.ub.edu/recursos-informacio/colleccions/colleccions-digitals/), Spain  
 [Library of Congress](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321123630/http:/www.loc.gov/library/libarch-digital.html), United States
author: Miguel Sousa
